text: I hired Attorney Jordan Finley as my attorney for my bankruptcy case. After meeting with him on my first visit, I felt very comfortable with him. He was very clear with all information. At the beginning until the end everything went smooth. People like him, make everything so much better. I am forever grateful. Thank you so much Jordan FinleyðŸ˜€
